scripts.build: cd packages/sdk && bun run build && cd ../utils && bun run build && cd ../agents && bun run build
scripts.local: bun run local:stop && bun run local:rebuild && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml -p dev up
scripts.local:stop: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml -p dev down --timeout 5 || docker kill $(docker ps -q)
scripts.dev: bun run dev:stop && bun run dev:rebuild && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev up
scripts.qa: bun run qa:stop && bun run qa:rebuild && docker compose -f docker-compose.qa.yml -p qa up
scripts.qa:stop: docker compose -f docker-compose.qa.yml -p qa down --timeout 5 || docker kill $(docker ps -q)
scripts.dev:core: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev up shared-packages cloud
scripts.dev:stop: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev down --timeout 5 || docker kill $(docker ps -q)
scripts.dev:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.prod:deploy: bun run prod:stop && bun run prod
scripts.logs:cloud: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev logs -f cloud --tail=0
